name: Chibi Pong Stars
description:
Game Description: Imagine 2D tennis, or a Super Version of Pong. 

The Ball will continuously move at 45 degrees between players, and you must swing when the ball is near you.  

Each hit makes the ball move faster.  Use your special to temporarily double the speed against your opponent.  

First to seven wins!

Controls

Controller: Movement (Left Joystick), Swing (B), Super (Right Bumper), Dance (Y), 

Pause Menu (Start), Restart – Game Over Menu (Back)

Keyboard: Movement (Arrow Keys), Swing (Q), Super (E), Dance (R), 

Pause Menu (Space), Restart – Game Over Menu (Enter)
